name: @aptre/common
description: Common project configuration files and dependencies.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json --noEmit false --outDir ./dist/
scripts.ci: npm run build && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:go
scripts.format: npm run format:go && npm run format:js && npm run format:config
scripts.format:js:changed: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep '\(\.ts\|\.tsx\|\.html\|\.css\|\.scss\)$' | xargs -I {} prettier --write {}
scripts.gen: rimraf ./.tools && go mod tidy && cd ./tools && go mod tidy && cd ../ && bash embed.bash && npm run format && npm run go:aptre:gen
scripts.gen:force: rimraf ./.tools && go mod tidy && cd ./tools && go mod tidy && cd ../ && bash embed.bash && npm run format && npm run go:aptre:gen --force
scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:go
scripts.lint: npm run lint:go && npm run lint:js
scripts.release:commit: git reset && git add package.json && git commit -s -m "release: v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release: npm run release:version && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:version:minor && npm run release:commit
